evidence: Both approaches give us ways to express functions as combinations of basic building blocks.
A summation represents the discrete case. An integral represents the continuous case.
With this foundation, we’re ready to move forward - and explore how delta functions connect directly to shift-invariant systems, which play a key role in imaging and signal processing.
